blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: so pretty it hurts

summary: good luck on your exam! That honestly sounds like a great fan fic tho lmao
question: good luck on your exam! That honestly sounds like a great fan fic tho lmao
answer:
:’) ty. I really really really really want to do good but I’ve been so sick all week i could barely revise. I just hope i can go over what’s left in a night and crash when i come home.

Also lol i might have saved that idea for a future fic. Who knows?

summary: I hope he is having a nice time with his family
question: I hope he is having a nice time with his family
answer: oh me too! definitely. i think sometimes when your away from your family all u need is a motherly hug or a family dinner to feel like you’ve got people around you that love u. i hope he has the best time there.

summary: i don't know man, the moving out theories.. they didn't seem possible a month ago but now i'm like possible? but also when i...
question: i don't know man, the moving out theories.. they didn't seem possible a month ago but now i'm like possible? but also when i think of it, why would they just go "im bored of living with my best friend of 10 years, im going to get an aparatment of my own" not only that but also having an apartment of your own isn't easy; more rent, more chores, being alone n stuff. we all know how dan is alone. but still possible. maybe they will be living with someone else. or we are just losing our minds. prob.
answer:
See, this is where that ~Mystery~ keeps coming in. That “are they a couple or not” question everyone loves to ask. Because it does kind of play a role in this particular discussion.

If they are a couple, then, yeah. It’s pretty unlikely they’d decide to move away from each other. I don’t know very many long-term couples who live together for years and then decide “you know what let’s get separate apartments” unless there’s some kind of break up happening.

However, if they’re not a couple, if they are just completely platonic best friends like they’ve been saying all this time (which is the most likely scenario) then… it kind of makes sense. At some point they’re going to want to go their own ways and have partners and kids and whatnot and I highly doubt they’d all live together in one big house like a big oddball family. Phil is 32, Dan is almost 28, and not that age means anything, but that’s usually when people start thinking about that type of thing. Settling down, families, the future, all that.

So, in conclusion, I think that it’s entirely possible that two separate moves may occur this year, if they aren’t happening under our nose as we speak. But of course, theories are just theories, and cannot be taken as fact. I think a moving theory is possible, even likely. I may be completely wrong. Time will tell.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Arguing/Fighting (4) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three

A Little Too Much - analester

Summary: Dan and Phil have gotten better at handling disagreements and arguments with each other. But still, couples fight, and sometimes things aren’t easily resolved. Despite it all, they still try to push through it.

Anytime (ao3) - LiterallyAmazingPhan

Summary: Phil considers himself a very patient guy. When Dan gets sick, however, he can be quite a handful and his boyfriend’s limits are put to test. After a little argument and Dan storming off, Phil finally has some peace to edit his video. But what will happen when Dan takes a turn for the worse? Comfort, fluff, sick!Dan, worried!Phil

Bad Day (ao3) - chachadeul

Summary: Nothing seems to be going right with everything that Dan does on that certain Saturday. It only got worse when Phil and him have a big argument for the first time in their new relationship.

Dan doesn’t like Harry Styles (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: At a big awards event Dan and Phil find themselves alone in a room with Harry Styles. Harry seems to enjoy flirting with Phil while Dan’s blood boils, he wants Phil- Harry can’t have him, but he keeps his mouth shut and watches the relationship happen.

Dan Moves Out (ao3) - Knighttimerose (LilMissHammond)

Summary: “The more they argue, the more Phil realizes how fragile their friendship has become over the past few months. Dan had been hiding himself away and their friendship was slowly crumbling.”

Five Years and Seven Months (ao3) - okbutphan

Summary: Dan hasn’t harmed in almost five years and seven months, but when he and Phil argue and Phil ends up storming out his feelings bubble over and the need is rising, and he does almost anything to stop himself.

Forgive Me (ao3) - HelloAnonymousWriter

Summary: Dan and Phil have an argument. Dan tells Phil to leave.

How Bad Could it Be? - fiction-phan

Summary: “We decided it would be fun to go camping and now it’s raining and we can’t figure out how to set up the tent.”

I’ll wait for you (ao3) - winstonlives

Summary: Phil needs time. Dan understands, so he books separate rooms.

I Try, But I Can’t Deny You - pasteldanhowells

Summary: After an argument, Dan storms out and heads to a bar, and soon realizes the mistake he’s made.

Jealousy’s a Bitch - fireonnotisdaniel

Summary: Dan and Phil have a huge fight, Phil thinks dans going to leave and sees his wedding suit in the closet, he puts it on and cries horribly, then Dan comes in, then it gets all fluffy.

Lead Me Back to You (ao3) - phanburnhamizzard

Summary: The grueling tour is finally over and without a break, Dan and Phil jump into the rigorous editing process. With frayed nerves and raw edges, the two men struggle to maintain their sanity –and their relationship–while producing a quality product for the fans.

“Look at your blue eyes” (ao3) - thesassykels66

Summary: Dan and Phil have a bit of an argument before meeting baby Pearl.

Maybe I Miss You (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Phil leaves Dan for several months to temporarily live in New York City and work on a movie set.

The distance between them drove them both insane, but neither of them could voice the reason why.

When Dan comes to visit Phil in New York his feelings are threatened to spill after an encounter with one of Phil’s new friends, but he keeps lying- to both Phil and himself.

Hopefully he can eventually tell the truth, because Phil gets another long-term job opportunity in California and Dan can’t take any more distance.

Puns, Tickle Fights, And A Squishy Rat Named Dan (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Dan and Phil get into a little argument on Valentine’s Day, but Phil was sure he could fix things with a few punny gifts.

So What Are You Waiting For? Someone Could Love You More (ao3) - alotofphandoms

Summary: “You’re unbelievable.” He growled deeply, before storming out of the lounge. Phil stood there for a moment in shock. He had never seen Dan so angry at him.

When Phil’s ex boyfriend messages Phil on Facebook, jealous Dan attacks and heated arguments follow. Dan packs a bag.

Spark; Boom - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan and Phil’s anniversaries; 2009-2016.

The Things I Didn’t Notice Before (ao3) - frominsideacomputer

Summary: Dan’s engaged to someone, and has just announced it to his fans. Phil isn’t so happy, because he’s in love with Dan and he doesn’t like Dan’s girlfriend. They argue and shit goes down.

We’re Going To Be Okay - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil have broken up, and things haven’t been the best. But, things go from bad to worse when Phil brings one of his ‘one night stands’ home with him.

reblog.comment:
part one, part two, part three

Five Years and Seven Months (ao3) - okbutphan

Summary: Dan hasn’t harmed in almost five years and seven months, but when he and Phil argue and Phil ends up storming out his feelings bubble over and the need is rising, and he does almost anything to stop himself.

Forgive Me (ao3) - HelloAnonymousWriter

Summary: Dan and Phil have an argument. Dan tells Phil to leave.

How Bad Could it Be? - fiction-phan

Summary: “We decided it would be fun to go camping and now it’s raining and we can’t figure out how to set up the tent.”

I’ll wait for you (ao3) - winstonlives

Summary: Phil needs time. Dan understands, so he books separate rooms.

I Try, But I Can’t Deny You - pasteldanhowells

Summary: After an argument, Dan storms out and heads to a bar, and soon realizes the mistake he’s made.

Jealousy’s a Bitch - fireonnotisdaniel

Summary: Dan and Phil have a huge fight, Phil thinks dans going to leave and sees his wedding suit in the closet, he puts it on and cries horribly, then Dan comes in, then it gets all fluffy.

Lead Me Back to You (ao3) - phanburnhamizzard

Summary: The grueling tour is finally over and without a break, Dan and Phil jump into the rigorous editing process. With frayed nerves and raw edges, the two men struggle to maintain their sanity –and their relationship–while producing a quality product for the fans.

“Look at your blue eyes” (ao3) - thesassykels66

Summary: Dan and Phil have a bit of an argument before meeting baby Pearl.

Maybe I Miss You (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Phil leaves Dan for several months to temporarily live in New York City and work on a movie set.

The distance between them drove them both insane, but neither of them could voice the reason why.

When Dan comes to visit Phil in New York his feelings are threatened to spill after an encounter with one of Phil’s new friends, but he keeps lying- to both Phil and himself.

Hopefully he can eventually tell the truth, because Phil gets another long-term job opportunity in California and Dan can’t take any more distance.

Puns, Tickle Fights, And A Squishy Rat Named Dan (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Dan and Phil get into a little argument on Valentine’s Day, but Phil was sure he could fix things with a few punny gifts.

So What Are You Waiting For? Someone Could Love You More (ao3) - alotofphandoms

Summary: “You’re unbelievable.” He growled deeply, before storming out of the lounge. Phil stood there for a moment in shock. He had never seen Dan so angry at him.

When Phil’s ex boyfriend messages Phil on Facebook, jealous Dan attacks and heated arguments follow. Dan packs a bag.

Spark; Boom - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan and Phil’s anniversaries; 2009-2016.

The Things I Didn’t Notice Before (ao3) - frominsideacomputer

Summary: Dan’s engaged to someone, and has just announced it to his fans. Phil isn’t so happy, because he’s in love with Dan and he doesn’t like Dan’s girlfriend. They argue and shit goes down.

We’re Going To Be Okay - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan and Phil have broken up, and things haven’t been the best. But, things go from bad to worse when Phil brings one of his ‘one night stands’ home with him.

trail.content_raw:
part one, part two, part three

A Little Too Much - analester

Summary: Dan and Phil have gotten better at handling disagreements and arguments with each other. But still, couples fight, and sometimes things aren’t easily resolved. Despite it all, they still try to push through it.

Anytime (ao3) - LiterallyAmazingPhan

Summary: Phil considers himself a very patient guy. When Dan gets sick, however, he can be quite a handful and his boyfriend’s limits are put to test. After a little argument and Dan storming off, Phil finally has some peace to edit his video. But what will happen when Dan takes a turn for the worse? Comfort, fluff, sick!Dan, worried!Phil

Bad Day (ao3) - chachadeul

Summary: Nothing seems to be going right with everything that Dan does on that certain Saturday. It only got worse when Phil and him have a big argument for the first time in their new relationship.

Dan doesn’t like Harry Styles (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: At a big awards event Dan and Phil find themselves alone in a room with Harry Styles. Harry seems to enjoy flirting with Phil while Dan’s blood boils, he wants Phil- Harry can’t have him, but he keeps his mouth shut and watches the relationship happen.
